divs: sighting detailsfirst, this is the exact object filmed over japan on july 26 2013 ( youtube) ,if not the same vehicle itself.i saw it in distance,& it looked bigger then a jet should be,there were clouds in distance to get somewhat of a gauge.it went straight, no arch.which means it had to be far from me perspective wise. one dark stripe verticle dead center the rest was white ,,white cigar shaped with a flat bottom but as it moved, the stripe did not change, as it would if it wer e a wing. then the sun reflected off of it in an unexplainable way, considering the shape, it appeared to be. the light was in a flat line on top as it went to back of vehicle.then went down the back of it, arched 1\4 of a circle, then forward a bit and ended.although the object appeared white, the reflection was gold. it did not make any sense that the reflection should have came from the back, considering where i was and where the vehicle was. it was wrong for a cigar, or a round, flat object. all i could figure was the back had to have been concave. the reflection off the sun made no sense. the sun was behind me and to my left. the reflection should have came near center, back. not forward.( my job was to draw buildings before they were built from blue prints, so i know about perspective and light. we were taught to think in " cad" before there were cad machines) this made no sense,unless the cigar or disc shape was not either. anyway..i watched with binoculars, it went behind a cloud, which was counties away. then did not come back into view.the only feeling i had after sighting, was that it was not normal.
